alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Orange; Washington; Western Rutland; Western Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 07 at 3:40AM EST until January 07 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected to continue. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Winds may gust to 30 mph at times resulting in some blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Essex County in northern New York and central and southern Vermont. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST today. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult with periods of very low visibility and potential for drifting snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates up to one inch per hour will be possible at times this morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Addison; Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Orange; Washington; Western Rutland; Western Windsor
